title: Black screen upon entering game
body:
I can join a game but I do not see the champion loading screen. Rather I see a black screen. In addition I can later hear the sounds and music of the game I have joined including kill announcements but All I have is a black screen and a dimly flashing "league" cursor. Lastly this was literally working fine two days ago.

I have a PC (3 monitor, 2 R9-280 setup)
Please help. Thanks!
Specs are
Inte(R) Core i7-2600K 3.4GHz
16Gb RAM
DirectX Version 12
More than enough hard disk space
2 AMD R9-280s

replies.body:
When you're getting a black screen in-game, there are a number of factors that could be an issue. The first and most likely is a program that's trying to draw over League and in the process, preventing it from running properly. Programs that create an overlay such as NZXT's CAM, Discord, Curse Voice, Overwolf, and many others are likely to cause this issue. Another possibility is that your Crossfire setup is not playing well with League, and running League with Crossfire disabled may resolve the issue. 

Finally, there are a number of steps in [this guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting), that address the other common solutions to this issue. 

Let me know if these steps helped.
